author: CNET
description: This device can turn your phone into a mobile gaming controller. MCON is a compact, magnetic gaming controller that transforms to meet your needs. It features deployable grips, hall-effect triggers, a kickback stand, and more. It’s available for preorder for $150 and comes in two colors. Unbox the MCON in the Day color with us. #mcon #unboxing #mobilecontroller #gaming #mobilegaming
title: Unboxing OhSnap’s $150 MCON Magnetic Mobile Gaming Controller 🎮📲
